en-US.summary: Selects songs to review for Suzuki Violin students
examplePhrases: Alexa ask suzuki violin for a review song.
Alexa get a practice song from suzuki violin.
Alexa tell suzuki violin my current song is the happy farmer.
en-US.name: Suzuki Violin Review
en-US.description: Helps players ensure they are practicing different review pieces, rather than always playing the same songs.
